title: Gravel Racing’s Largest Single Day Prize Purse is Now in Nebraska
content:
In 2025 Lauf Gravel Worlds will put up $100,000 for the top 10 male and female elite racers who are the fastest to the finish line; the event will also donate that amount to local bike-based charities.

Read the full article at Gravel Racing’s Largest Single Day Prize Purse is Now in Nebraska on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
